name: Alien: Evolution
description:
Alien: Evolution Game Made With Godot Engine For Space Jam 2021

Are You Ready To Start Flying Around And Destroying Ultra-Advanced And Futuristic Enemies? If So, Just Jump Into The Game!

In Your Universe, Each World Has 3 Levels. There Are 2 Worlds, And Your Goal Is To Explore Them And Discover All Their Secrets. There Are 2 Different Weapons, 2 Movement Mechanics And 2 Different Types Of Enemies.

ControlsWASDMoveMouseAimSpaceDashLMBShootRMBMegashoot
